mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of the upper part of Italy : containing ye Principality of Piemont, ye Dutchies of Savoy, Milan, Parma, Mantua, Modena, Tuscany, the Dominions of ye Pope &c. the Republiques of Venice, Genoe, Lucca &c.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moll, Herman, -1732
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 61 x 102 cm. on sheet 63 x 107 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Sold by H. Moll overagainst Devereux Court, between Temple Bar and St. Clements Church in the Strand... ; printed and sold by Tho: Bowles next the Chapter House in St. Pauls Church-yard, and Iohn Bowles at the Black Horse in Cornhill.
